meanings.sent1: The wild horse remained unridden by any person.
meanings.sent2: The bicycle was left unridden in the garage for years.
meanings.sent3: The unridden roller coaster looked lonely without any passengers.
meanings.sent4: Her unridden emotions bubbled beneath the surface, waiting to be expressed.
meanings.sent5: The unridden path through the forest beckoned to the adventurous hiker.

meanings.definition: Not controlled or influenced by someone else
meanings.sent1: The decision was made in an unridden moment of clarity.
meanings.sent2: She wanted to live an unridden life free from outside expectations.
meanings.sent3: The unridden puppet suddenly came to life and started dancing on its own.
meanings.sent4: His unridden thoughts soared like untamed birds in the vast sky of his mind.
meanings.sent5: The unridden river flowed freely, untouched by human hands.
